Interface IRay3

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ray3
public interface IRay3

Provides read-only access to a Ray3.

Method Summary
 IVector3 direction()
          Returns a reference to the ray's unit direction vector.
 IVector3 origin()
          Returns a reference to the ray's point of origin.
